lines.text: There's too many rules in this house.
A man is not a man unless he knows how to mix a proper martini and tie a proper bowtie.
You never trusted me before. You have to trust me now.
I blow her head off, Timmy.
Everything's under control. Timmy's got the idea.
I'll be outta here in less than an hour.

[Brenda warned her agents to not fire at the house, but she wasn't heard and they fired anyway. A cop tries to rescue her]
Are you hurt?
